title: Pharma Latch - Drug and vaccine delivery
description: Pharma Latch is a revolutionary drug and vaccine delivery device. A new form of microneedle drug delivery technologies
cleaned_text: a revolutionary drug and vaccine delivery technology that can deliver on the promise of intradermal (skin) delivery. Skin is replete with immune cells, the high concentrations in specific layers promoting and facilitating improved physiological and immunological responses. The intradermal delivery promise includes: However, other technologies struggle to deliver on this promise.
